    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getAltitudeWeather(java.lang.String strAlt)
      This function will call getpos to determine where to start extracting seven characters from the class level variable containing the Station Weather.
      static int getPos(java.lang.String strAlt)
      This function accepts a string called strAlt representing an altitude and returns an integer representing the starting character position of the altitude weather in the station weather string
      static java.lang.String getWindDir(java.lang.String strAlt)
      This function will call getAltitudeWeather and extract the first two characters and concatenate a zero to the return value.
      static java.lang.String getWindSpeed(java.lang.String strAlt)
      This calls the method, getAltitudeWeather extract the 2nd and 3rd characters of the stationWeather string.
      static java.lang.String getWindTemp(java.lang.String strAlt)
      This method calls the method, getAltitudeWeather extract final characters of the stationWeather string.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException

      • getPos

        public static int getPos(java.lang.String strAlt)
        This function accepts a string called strAlt representing an altitude and returns an integer representing the starting character position of the altitude weather in the station weather string
        Parameters:
        strAlt - Altitude in thousands as a string
        Returns:
        an integer representing the character postion with the station weather

      • getAltitudeWeather

        public static java.lang.String getAltitudeWeather(java.lang.String strAlt)
        This function will call getpos to determine where to start extracting seven characters from the class level variable containing the Station Weather.
        Parameters:
        strAlt - - string representing altitude in thousands of feet.
        Returns:
        seven character string representing the altitude weather.

      • getWindDir

        public static java.lang.String getWindDir(java.lang.String strAlt)
        This function will call getAltitudeWeather and extract the first two characters and concatenate a zero to the return value.
        Parameters:
        strAlt - String representing altitude in thousands of feet.
        Returns:
        windDir String representing wind direction at the specified altitude

      • getWindSpeed

        public static java.lang.String getWindSpeed(java.lang.String strAlt)
        This calls the method, getAltitudeWeather extract the 2nd and 3rd characters of the stationWeather string. The method returns them as the wind speed at the specified altitude.
        Parameters:
        strAlt - Altitude in thousands as a string
        Returns:
        windSpeed The wind speed at the specified altitude

      • getWindTemp

        public static java.lang.String getWindTemp(java.lang.String strAlt)
        This method calls the method, getAltitudeWeather extract final characters of the stationWeather string. The method returns them as the temperature at the specified altitude.
        Parameters:
        strAlt - Altitude in thousands as a string
        Returns:
        windTemp The temperature of the air at the specified altitude
